title: Fs PSA T206's added 180 cards nice prices
author: Phillies*phan

posts.post_title: Fs PSA T206's added 180 cards nice prices
posts.post_content:
Selling about 250 Psa t206's.  All cards on the list are available.  I haven't been marking them sold.  I just erase them.  Backs are piedmont or Sweet Cap unless noted.  Prices are per card and payment is Paypal gift, money order or check.  I can send pics if requested or cert #'s

   psa 2's (most of the 2's have vg-ex fronts with some staining on the back, no paper loss).  $27 each
